languages.text: Вам передают примерный маршрут "Алого преследователя" — информацию о системах, где его можно найти в будущем. Капитан будет рад новой встрече — и информации о пылающих мирах, если она у вас появится.

traits.locale_text: Вам передают примерный маршрут "Алого преследователя" — информацию о системах, где его можно найти в будущем. Капитан будет рад новой встрече — и информации о пылающих мирах, если она у вас появится.

languages.text: You receive the Scarlet Pursuer's projected itinerary: information on systems in which you can find it later. The captain looks forward to meeting you again — and acquiring information on burning worlds, should you possess it.
languages.original_text: Вам передают примерный маршрут "Алого преследователя" — информацию о системах, где его можно найти в будущем. Капитан будет рад новой встрече — и информации о пылающих мирах, если она у вас появится.

traits.locale_text: You receive the Scarlet Pursuer's projected itinerary: information on systems in which you can find it later. The captain will be happy to meet you again — and get information on burning worlds, should you have it.

You receive the Scarlet Pursuer's projected itinerary: information on systems in which you can find it later. The captain looks forward to meeting you again — and acquiring information on burning worlds, should you possess it.

You receive the Scarlet Pursuer's projected itinerary: information on systems in which you can find it later. The captain looks forward to meeting you again — and acquiring information on burning worlds, should you possess it.

You receive the Scarlet Pursuer's projected itinerary: information on systems in which you can find it later. The captain looks forward to meeting you again — and acquiring information on burning worlds, should you possess it.

languages.text: 你收到了猩红追击者号未来的行程，阐明了它接下来会前往哪些星系，让你知道接下来该去哪里找它。绍恩舰长也期待着与你再次见面，同时也希望，如果你对燃烧世界有任何了解的话，希望你能与他分享这些情报。
languages.original_text: You receive the Scarlet Pursuer's projected itinerary: information on systems in which you can find it later. The captain looks forward to meeting you again — and acquiring information on burning worlds, should you possess it.

traits.locale_text: 你收到了猩红追击者号未来的行程，阐明了它接下来会前往哪些星系，让你知道接下来该去哪里找它。绍恩舰长也期待着与你再次见面，同时也希望，如果你对燃烧群界有任何了解的话，希望你能与他分享这些情报。

languages.text: スカーレット・パースア号の旅程を受け取る。後々見つけることのできる星系の情報だ。船長は再び会えることを楽しみにしている。そして、バーニングワールドの情報があるのであれば、それを手に入れたいと考えている。
languages.original_text: You receive the Scarlet Pursuer's projected itinerary: information on systems in which you can find it later. The captain looks forward to meeting you again — and acquiring information on burning worlds, should you possess it.

traits.locale_text: スカーレット・パースア号の旅程を受け取る。後々見つけることのできる星系の情報だ。船長は再び会えることを楽しみにしている。そして、バーニングワールドの情報があるのであれば、それを手に入れたいと考えている。

languages.text: Recibes el itinerario programado de la Persecutora Escarlata: información sobre en qué sistemas estará para encontrarla más adelante. El capitán expresa su interés en volver a verte y en comprar cualquier información sobre mundos ardientes que consigas.
languages.original_text: You receive the Scarlet Pursuer's projected itinerary: information on systems in which you can find it later. The captain looks forward to meeting you again — and acquiring information on burning worlds, should you possess it.

traits.locale_text: Recibes el itinerario programado de la Persecutora Escarlata: información sobre en qué sistemas estará para encontrarla más adelante. El capitán expresa su interés en volver a verte y en comprar cualquier información sobre mundos {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardientes{/g} que consigas.

languages.text: Du erhältst den vorgeschlagenen Reiseplan des Scharlachroten Verfolgers: Informationen zu Systemen, in denen du ihn später finden kannst. Der Captain freut sich darauf, dich wiederzusehen — und Informationen zu brennenden Welten zu erhalten, solltest du sie besitzen.
languages.original_text: You receive the Scarlet Pursuer's projected itinerary: information on systems in which you can find it later. The captain looks forward to meeting you again — and acquiring information on burning worlds, should you possess it.

traits.locale_text: Du erhältst den vorgeschlagenen Reiseplan des Scharlachroten Verfolgers: Informationen zu Systemen, in denen du ihn später finden kannst. Der Captain freut sich darauf, dich wiederzusehen — und Informationen zu brennenden Welten zu erhalten, solltest du sie besitzen.

languages.text: Vous recevez les futurs plans de vol du Chasseur Écarlate et la liste des systèmes dans lesquels vous pourrez le retrouver par la suite. Le capitaine a hâte de vous revoir et d'obtenir de plus amples renseignements sur les mondes brûlants, si par un heureux hasard vous découvriez quoi que ce soit.
languages.original_text: You receive the Scarlet Pursuer's projected itinerary: information on systems in which you can find it later. The captain looks forward to meeting you again — and acquiring information on burning worlds, should you possess it.

traits.locale_text: Vous recevez les futurs plans de vol du Chasseur Écarlate et la liste des systèmes dans lesquels vous pourrez le retrouver par la suite. Le capitaine a hâte de vous revoir et d'obtenir de plus amples renseignements sur les mondes brûlants, si par un heureux hasard vous découvriez quoi que ce soit.

languages.text: Lal Takipçi'nin gelecekteki rotasıyla ilgili bir proje planı alıyorsun. İleride onu bulabileceğin sistemlerle ilgili bilgiler içeriyor. Kaptan, seni tekrar görmeyi ve yanan dünyalar hakkında bilgi edinmen durumunda bunlardan haberdar olmayı dört gözle bekliyor.
languages.original_text: You receive the Scarlet Pursuer's projected itinerary: information on systems in which you can find it later. The captain looks forward to meeting you again — and acquiring information on burning worlds, should you possess it.
